description:
The present course is an innovative approach to learning Russian as foreign language at the elementary level, and consists of two parts.

The first part of the course focuses on learning Russian alphabet, pronunciation and basic sentence structure. Due to the specific order in which the letters of Russian alphabet are presented you will start to read your first Russian words within five minutes of your first lecture. Thus you will be accompilishing three things at once: learning the Russian letters, practicing pronunciation and learning A1 level basic vocabulary of Russian as foreign language.

The second part of the course will help you to acquire basic skills for communication in Russian.

The content of the course is suitable for language learning and teaching as an intensive as well as a regular course.
title: Russian in Graphics: Learn Russian through animated videos
